content: Then look opposite the golden box to see a treasure chest inside the small building. Open this to pick up Blood of the Iron Bull and some gold pieces.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rakshasa Palace'.
The content is as follows:
Then look opposite the golden box to see a treasure chest inside the small building. Open this to pick up Blood of the Iron Bull and some gold pieces.
